summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4604 for the improvement of the alley in block 15, Woodlawn Addition to Green Lake, being the alley between East Green Lake Way, Woodlawn Avenue, East 72nd Street and Maple Leaf Place, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53581, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
